title: misc: file not found: /go/misc/vim/readme.txt
body:
If I point my browser to http://golang.org/misc/vim/readme.txt I see mkisc/vim was removed.

What a pity, it was a good idea to have a simple vim plugin, so a user don't waste time trying to figure out which is the best. It is so good to have defaults.

But the question is: where it is gone misc/vim? Does it have a substitute? Can you add a link or a redirect to it? It is against golang policies to remove things, right?

I have a misc/vim from golanjg 1.2, and I can upload it to GitHub if you want.
